English summary:
The game was made for the Hanse Game Jam, organized by the Hansemuseum in Lubeck, northern Germany. Its aim was to bring together Historians, game developers and all others interested. The game uses the Carta Marina, a map of Scandinavia and Northern Europe dated back to 1536. Through sound and animations it's turned into an interactive puzzle game, encouraring people to explore its details and raise interest in the Hanse area.
